StarCount.Title: Star count
StarCount.Label: Number of star reactions required for a message to be highlighted in the starboard channel:
StarCount.Ignore: Ignore stars reacted by the message author
StarCount.Automatic: Automatically add a star reaction to posts in the starboard channel

Starboard.Title: Starboard Channel
Starboard.Label: Messages that hit the star count (7 stars) will be highlighted in this channel:

IgnoreChannels.Title: Ignored Channels
IgnoreChannels.Label: Dyno will not highlight any messages sent in any of these channels.:

IgnoreRoles.Title: Ignored Roles
IgnoreRoles.Label: Messages that hit the star count (7 stars) will be highlighted in this channel:

Color.Title: Embed Color
Color.Label: Change the embed bar color of starboarded posts:

CustomThreshold.Title: Add Custom Starboard
CustomThreshold.Label: Add custom overrides for thresholds (if none, all channels will use the default threshold in Settings).

CustomThreshold.Title: Add Custom Starboard
CustomThreshold.Label: Add specific to a custom starboard channel other than the main starboard channel (can be helpful for hidden starboards).
